content_parts.title: Introduction
content_parts.content: Check out what's new in the 2024 R9 release.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
Stock receipt number

The stock receipt number generates automatically from the default sequence number associated with it.

Single status

Stock receipt single status includes the stock receipt status, stock detail status, and stock status.

Filtering

You can filter by status.

Additional columns for main list

You can display additional columns in the main list such as:

  • Reason
  • Status

Main list row actions

You can perform several key actions from the main list to save time, such as:

  • Set dimensions
  • Delete
To improve data management, you can manage items with sequence numbers.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.title: Unable to reset Sage Intacct customer ID

content_parts.content: You can reset the Sage Intacct customer ID when the synchronization status is in error or not integrated. This includes resetting IDs that are too long.

content_parts.title: Total excluding tax is calculated incorrectly for partial purchase receipts

content_parts.content: When you create multiple purchase receipts from a single purchase order, the Total amount excluding tax is calculated correctly.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Distribution' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.title: A quantity of zero on a shipment prevents deleting the line

content_parts.content: You cannot enter a quantity of zero on a sales shipment line.

content_parts.title: Stock adjustment status does not update

content_parts.content: You can update a stock adjustment status that is posted and displays incorrectly as In progress.

content_parts.title: Unable to add new standard cost

content_parts.content: Rounding stock change values was improved so that you can add a new standard cost.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment: Incorrect status blocks allocation

content_parts.content: You can update the sales shipment status to Shipped without error.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment line error blocks posting shipments

content_parts.content: You can post a sales shipment where serial numbers were assigned to items without an error.

content_parts.title: Allocate stock displays error for purchase returns

content_parts.content: The Allocate stock action is available on a purchase return with more than 10 lines.

content_parts.title: Location mass creation error when the same storage zone is created for multiple sites

content_parts.content: You cannot use the same ID for storage zones across sites.

content_parts.title: Purchase order: Cannot modify lines when the status is variance approved

content_parts.content: You can modify the lines of a purchase invoice when the status is variance approved.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Finance' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Finance' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
The Unbilled accounts receivable and payable inquiries include additional details, such as the original document date, which corresponds to the shipping date or receipt date, respectively.

These inquiries run in the background so that you can continue working. A message displays when complete.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Finance' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.title: Stock receipt journal entry type posts incorrectly

content_parts.content: For US legislation, the stock receipt journal entry type posts correctly to the stock receipt account type.

content_parts.title: Cannot modify Adjusted amount on a purchase invoice

content_parts.content: You can update the Adjusted amount on a purchase invoice when the status is Variance approved.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Integration' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
Integrating with Sage Intacct streamlines operations for French companies by eliminating manual processes and data entry. This seamless integration minimizes disruptions and supports the automated transfer of AP/AR invoices, credit memos, general ledger transactions, and master data.

Additionally, you can integrate and sync dimensions, projects, and tasks for a comprehensive, multi-dimensional view within your financial management system.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Manufacturing' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.title: The Allocate stock action is disabled on WO component lines

content_parts.content: The Allocate stock action on work order component lines is available.

content_parts.title: Time tracking: Cannot add a new operation to a work order

content_parts.content: You can add a new operation to a work order from the Time tracking page.

content_parts.title: Unable to exclude text components from work orders

content_parts.content: Text components can be excluded or deleted from work orders.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Platform' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of"))

content_parts.content: You can attach files successfully.

content_parts.title: New sales order line validation error

content_parts.content: When creating a sales order, you can add lines in the grid without a validation error.

content_parts.title: Unable to duplicate an item with customer links

content_parts.content: You can successfully duplicate items even if a customer is linked to the item.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User Experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'User Experience' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

content_parts.content: To improve data sorting and visibility of manufacturing processes, you can use the Tracking date in the Production tracking line, Material tracking line, and Time tracking line inquiries.
A warning message displays when you duplicate or change the status of a document that contains an inactive item.
